top_stories.title: Equity’s 2026 Predictions: AI Agents, Blockbuster IPOs, and the Future of VC
top_stories.description: TechCrunch’s Equity crew is bringing 2025 to a close and getting ahead on the year to come with our annual predictions episode! Hosts Kirsten Korosec, Anthony Ha, and Rebecca Bellan were joined by Build Mode host Isabelle Johannessen to dissect the year’s biggest tech developments, from mega AI funding rounds that defied expectations to the rise of “physical AI,” and make […]
top_stories.author: Theresa Loconsolo, Kirsten Korosec, Rebecca Bellan, Anthony Ha, Isabelle Johannessen
top_stories.content: TechCrunch’s Equity crew is bringing 2025 to a close and getting ahead on the year to come with our annual predictions episode! top_stories.title: Evaluating chain-of-thought monitorability
top_stories.description: OpenAI introduces a new framework and evaluation suite for chain-of-thought monitorability, covering 13 evaluations across 24 environments. Our findings show that monitoring a model’s internal reasoning is far more effective than monitoring outputs alone, offering a promising path toward scalable control as AI systems grow more capable.
top_stories.content: OpenAI introduces a new framework and evaluation suite for chain-of-thought monitorability, covering 13 evaluations across 24 environments. Our findings show that monitoring a model’s internal reasoning is far more effective than monitoring outputs alone, offering a promising path toward scalable control as AI systems grow more capable.

top_stories.title: Reducing CUDA Binary Size to Distribute cuML on PyPI
top_stories.description: Starting with the 25.10 release, pip-installable cuML wheels can now be downloaded directly from PyPI. No more complex installation steps or managing Conda...
top_stories.author: Divye Gala
top_stories.content: Starting with the 25.10 release, pip-installable cuML wheels can now be downloaded directly from PyPI. No more complex installation steps or managing Conda...

top_stories.title: Introducing Visa Intelligent Commerce on AWS: Enabling agentic commerce with Amazon Bedrock AgentCore
top_stories.description: In this post, we explore how AWS and Visa are partnering to enable agentic commerce through Visa Intelligent Commerce using Amazon Bedrock AgentCore. We demonstrate how autonomous AI agents can transform fragmented shopping and travel experiences into seamless, end-to-end workflows—from discovery and comparison to secure payment authorization—all driven by natural language.
top_stories.author: Sangeetha Bharath, Seemal Zaman
top_stories.content: In this post, we explore how AWS and Visa are partnering to enable agentic commerce through Visa Intelligent Commerce using Amazon Bedrock AgentCore. We demonstrate how autonomous AI agents can transform fragmented shopping and travel experiences into seamless, end-to-end workflows—from discovery and comparison to secure payment authorization—all driven by natural language.

top_stories.title: Accelerate Enterprise AI Development using Weights & Biases and Amazon Bedrock AgentCore
top_stories.description: In this post, we demonstrate how to use Foundation Models (FMs) from Amazon Bedrock and the newly launched Amazon Bedrock AgentCore alongside W&B Weave to help build, evaluate, and monitor enterprise AI solutions. We cover the complete development lifecycle from tracking individual FM calls to monitoring complex agent workflows in production.
top_stories.author: James Yi
top_stories.content: In this post, we demonstrate how to use Foundation Models (FMs) from Amazon Bedrock and the newly launched Amazon Bedrock AgentCore alongside W&B Weave to help build, evaluate, and monitor enterprise AI solutions.
